CacheAction - Class in com.hci.geotagger.cache
The CacheAction class is used to maintain information about Action caching.

CacheAction constructor that creates a CacheAction object using the input Action parameters NameValuePair List.

cacheAction(String, String) - Method in class com.hci.geotagger.cache.CacheHandler
This method will add the input action to the Action Cache.
cacheAction(String, List<NameValuePair>) - Method in class com.hci.geotagger.cache.CacheHandler
This method will add the input action, represented by the list of NameValuePair objects, to the Action Cache.
cacheAction(String, List<NameValuePair>, List<NameValuePair>) - Method in class com.hci.geotagger.cache.CacheHandler
This method will put the Action in the action cache, including the post operations.
CacheDatabase - Class in com.hci.geotagger.cache
The CacheDatabase class contains definitions and methods that are used to access the Geotagger Cache Database.

This constructor calls the SQLiteOpenHelper constructor to create the SQLite Helper object.

This public class is used to return cached image information.

CacheHandler - Class in com.hci.geotagger.cache
The CacheHandler class is the main class used to handle the Geotagger Cache operations.

cleanUp(long) - Method in class com.hci.geotagger.cache.CacheDatabase
This method will clean up the database by removing any records that are old and have not been accessed in a determined period of time.
cleanup() - Method in class com.hci.geotagger.cache.CacheHandler
This method should be called periodically to cleanup the cache.
clearAndCreateDB(SQLiteDatabase) - Method in class com.hci.geotagger.cache.CacheDatabase
This method will clear all of the database indices and tables and then re-create the database tables and indices
clearDB() - Method in class com.hci.geotagger.cache.CacheDatabase
This method will delete all records from all of the tables in the Geotagger cache database.
